attributes.action: implement Sarah's Law throughout the UK immediately!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The forces in Warwickshire, Cleveland, Hampshire and Cambridgeshire have been involved in a pilot scheme, enforcing Sarah's Law. 
We, the undersigned, believe it is now time to enforce Sarah's Law throughout the entire UK.
Sara Payne has been fighting for almost 10 years now to help protect our children from convicted child sex offenders. They are evil people who have inflicted pain and suffering and in some cases, horrific deaths upon innocent children. We deserve to know if that evil is lurking on our streets! 
We want limited access to information and do not condone vigilante actions.
Please help us protect our children!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
